simulation.lexicon

Interface Lexicon

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WeightedLexicon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LimitedWeightsLexicon

    public interface Lexicon
    An interface providing all methods expected from agents' lexicons in naming games-based computer models of language evolution. In this implementation, lexicon can be seen as a set of thing-word associations.
    See Also:
    LimitedWeightsLexicon, Agent, SuccessCountingAgent

    • Method Summary

      Returns true if this lexicon contains the given thing associated with the given word.
      java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Integer> countDominatingWords(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
      Returns a map from the given collection of languages to integers such that each language is mapped to the number of dominating words in this lexicon
      boolean oneToOne()
      Returns true if each thing contained in this lexicon is associated with only one word.
      java.util.Map<Language,java.util.Collection<Thing>> recognizedThings(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
      Returns a map from the given collection of languages to collections of things such that each language is mapped to the collection of things recognized with the words belonging to it in this lexicon
      Word signal(Thing thing)
      Returns the dominating word denoting the given thing in this lexicon.

      Returns a collection of things containing all things associated with any word in this lexicon.
      java.util.Collection<Word> words(Thing thing)

      • contains

        boolean contains(Thing thing)
        Returns true if this lexicon contains the given thing associated with any word.
        Parameters:
        thing - a thing to be checked for containment
        Returns:

      • countDominatingWords

        java.util.Map<Language,java.lang.Integer> countDominatingWords(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
        Returns a map from the given collection of languages to integers such that each language is mapped to the number of dominating words in this lexicon
        Parameters:
        languages - a collection of languages to be a domain of returned map
        Returns:
        a map between languages and numbers such that each language from the specified collection of languages is mapped to the number of dominating words in this lexicon

      • recognizedThings

        java.util.Map<Language,java.util.Collection<Thing>> recognizedThings(java.util.Collection<Language> languages)
        Returns a map from the given collection of languages to collections of things such that each language is mapped to the collection of things recognized with the words belonging to it in this lexicon
        Parameters:
        languages - a collection of languages to be a domain of returned map
        Returns:
        a map between languages and numbers such that each language from the specified collection of languages is mapped to the collection of things recognized with the words belonging to it in this lexicon

      • oneToOne

        boolean oneToOne()
        Returns true if each thing contained in this lexicon is associated with only one word. More formally, it returns true if this lexicon can be described as an injective function from the space of contained things to the space of words.
        Returns:
        true if each thing contained in this lexicon is associated with only one word; false otherwise.
